title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python library for Ollama; chat, embed, pull, and manage local models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; works in Node, Bun, and modern browsers.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use any Ollama model as an LLM or chat backend.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-web/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, model manager, multi-user, dark mode).

title: ollama-cli (sugar-ai/ollama-cli)
summary: Interactive TUI for Ollama powered by Bubble Tea; browse, pull, chat, and manage models.

title: ollama-copilot (github-copilot-local)
summary: Experimental VS-Code extension that routes Copilot calls to a local Ollama model.

title: ollama4j (ollama-java)
summary: Unofficial Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with POJO mapping and Spring Boot starters.

title: ollama-rag (ingest + chat PDF example)
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings and Chroma vector store to chat with PDFs.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-laravel
summary: Laravel service provider and facade for Ollama; chat, embed, list models via Artisan commands.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-host Discord bot that answers questions using any Ollama model.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling and PVC support.

title: ollama-npm (npm search)
summary: Registry listing 40+ community packages: clients, CLI wrappers, Express middleware, etc.

title: ollama-pypi (PyPI search)
summary: PyPI shows official ollama package plus 25+ utilities: Django apps, FastAPI templates, embedders.
